menuItems.description: array of tab objects to be loaded into the component

iconMenuItems.description: array of tab objects to be loaded into the component

onMenuSelected.description: the function to call when Jump to option is clicked

onEnterAccount.description: function to call when an account is selected

onEnter.description: the function to call when a alert is selected

onSelected.description: the function to call when a specific alert preview is selected

onEnterExec.description: function to call when an exec is selected

onEnterSector.description: the function to call when an sector is selected

onEnterSmartFilter.description: the function to call when a smart filter is selected

position.description: the position for the popup, in px

active.description: value to determine if the popup is currently visible

className.description: Used to assign custom styles based on context

methods.name: onClick

params.name: seriesIndex
params.description:
This is a param with a description too long to fit in
    one line.

params.name: position
params.description: This is the description for the obect

returns.description:
There is actually no boolean returned but this is being included
    purposes of showing the syntax

methods.description: This is the description for the onclick function

value.description: the value of the current selection

listItems.description: Object of key/values or array representing all items suggested

allowBlank.description: If false the dropdown will preselect the first item if the supplied value matches none of the options' values.

onChange.description: the function to call when the list value changes

icon.description: the string value used to specify the FA-Icon

onClick.description: the function to call on the click event

disabled.description: the icon to be used in th avatar

className.description: ClassName for position or styling being passed

menuOptions.description: Optional list of popout menu options

imageUrl.description: the string image URL to be used in the avatar, takes precedence

icon.description: the icon to be used in th avatar

iconColor.description: the background color of the avatar

title.description: the main title of the list item

subtitle.description: the subtitle of the list item

onClick.description: the function to call on the click event

tabs.description: array of tab objects to be loaded into the component

tabIndex.description: index of the current tab, overrides default of 0

onChange.description: the function to call when the tab value changes

maxArticles.description: value that specifies the upper limit of items to display

news.description: news item object containing articles, count and images

showDescription.description: boolean value that specifies whether or not the item description is visible

showChildArticles.description: boolean value that specifies whether or not to show child articles for tweets

onViewMoreClicked.description: callback when View more button is cliecked

id.description: id value to be used within component

title.description: value of title to be used within the component

subtitle.description: value of subtitle to be used within the component

imageUrl.description: URL of image to be used in component

iconName.description: name of icon to be used in FAIcon component

iconColor.description: background color to be used in FAIcon component

execTwitterUrl.description: url string value for exec twitter

execLinkedinUrl.description: url string value for exec linkedin

hideJumpTo.description: boolean that specifies whether the JumpTo should be hidden

hideAction.description: boolean that specifies whether the ActionMenu should be hidden

hideFavourite.description: boolean that specifies whether the FavouriteToggle should be hidden

actions.description: array of action objects to be loaded into the ActionMenucomponent

onActionMenuClicked.description: the function to call when the ActionMenu component changes

text.description: the text to split into paragraphs

className.description: the className for the containing div

message.description: string value for the dialog message

active.description: boolean value that specifies whether the popup is visible

onCancel.description: specifies the action to take on esc or Cancel

entity.description: string to identify which entity to display

active.description: boolean value that specifies whether the popup is visible

onCancel.description: specifies the action to take on external clicks and Cancel

onSelect.description: onUpdated function call to register icon with API

iconName.description: string class value for the FA icon

iconColor.description: string hex value for the icon background color

active.description: boolean value that specifies whether the popup is visible

onCancel.description: specifies the action to take on external clicks and Cancel

onUpdated.description: onUpdated function call to register icon with API

ruleId.description: the id of the rule item

iconType.description: type of icon ex. material-icons if empty FA icon is going to be rendered

onAction.description: the function to call when an action is clicked

onSubmitSearch.description: the function to call when a search is submitted

submitOnChange.description: call submit when search value changes

showIcon.description: should an icon be displayed in the list

list.description: the list of data to display and search

listHeight.description: height of the scrolling list section

searchLabel.description: the hint to display in the search box

initialSelection.description: the initial selections in the list

onSelectionChanged.description: function to call when a selection changes

selectAll.description: include a select all option (only valid when multiSelect: true)

sortFunction.description: the sort function to use (will default to sortByName)

loading.description: show a loading indicator when loading is true

favourites.description: favourite ids (if present a favourite option will be shown at the top of the list)

empty.description: specify if section content is empty

emptyMsg.description: message to display when section is empty

onViewMoreClick.description: If onViewMoreClick is being passed show View More button at bottom right

lists.description: the lists object passed in from redux state

entitiesToSearch.description: array of entityTypes to search (if this is omitted all types will be searched)

allowUnmatched.description: if allowed unmatched results will return with an undefined listName

unmatchedMessage.description: applies to allowUnmatched false only - error message to display if match isn't found

unmatchedLabel.description: applies to allowUnmatched true only - Label next to the unmatched option in the list (default is 'Search for')

onSearchSubmitted.description: the function to call when search submitted

overrideSubmit.description: the function to call when on manual submit

floatingLabel.description: should the label float above while editing

selections.description: the currently selected items (to exclude from suggestions)

showSelections.description: show the current selections within the smart search as chips

onDeleteSelection.description: the function to call when a chip is deleted

onChange.description: the function to call when there is a change

showSearchButton.description: default showSearchButton is true if false is passed no button is going to be displayed

selectList.description: option to include selectable list popout menu

selectListChange.description: the function to call when there is a select list change

suggestionsHeight.description: static height of the suggestions list

title.description: title to be used alongside time picker

onChanged.description: function to call when a selection changes

timezones.description: function to call when a selection changes

label.description: value of the text to display

left.description: left attribute for tooltip, in px

top.description: top attribute for tooltip, in px

display.description: value to deteremine if the tooltip is currently visible

additionalStyles.description: Used to assign custom styles based on context

onClick.description: callback function when tour launcher clicked

list.description: the list prop should be an array of objects containing all the props required for the itemComponent id is the only required prop

additionalReturnParam.description: additional object key to return in the loadMore function (id is always returned)
